title: Number of U.S. households with broadband internet access 2000 to 2018
yAxis: Number of U.S. households with broadband internet access (in millions)
summary: Overall Number of U.S. households with broadband internet access (in millions) has increased over the Year.
Number of U.S. households with broadband internet access (in millions) is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2012, and lastly roughly constant from 2012 to 2014.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2010.
The highest Number of U.S. households with broadband internet access (in millions), of value 97.81 was reached at Year 2014
The lowest Number of U.S. households with broadband internet access (in millions), of value 79.99 was reported at Year 2009
